`plots.maps`

### map_1var { #scahpy.plots.maps.map_1var }

```python
plots.maps.map_1var(
    da,
    *,
    levels,
    cmap='rain',
    shapefile=None,
    extent=None,
    xticks=None,
    yticks=None,
    tick_step=(5, 5),
    draw_grid=False,
    time=None,
    month=None,
    title=None,
    colorbar_label=None,
    output_path=None,
)
```

Draw a filled map of a single scalar variable.

The same temporal selection is applied to the data via:
    - `month` (for climatological datasets with a `month` coordinate), or
    - `time` (for datasets with a `time` coordinate; can be int index or str timestamp).

#### Parameters {.doc-section .doc-section-parameters}

| Name           | Type               | Description                                                                      | Default    |
|----------------|--------------------|----------------------------------------------------------------------------------|------------|
| da             | xarray.DataArray   | Scalar field with coordinates `(lat, lon)` and optionally `time` or `month`.     | _required_ |
| levels         | iterable of float  | Discrete color levels for the filled contours.                                   | _required_ |
| cmap           | str                | Name of the cmocean colormap to use (lightened internally).                      | `'rain'`   |
| shapefile      | str or None        | Path to a custom shapefile. If None, uses the default South America shape.       | `None`     |
| extent         | tuple or None      | Map extent `(lon_min, lon_max, lat_min, lat_max)`. If None, uses DEFAULT_EXTENT. | `None`     |
| time           | int or str or None | If dataset has `time`, selects a single frame: index (int) or timestamp (str).   | `None`     |
| month          | int or None        | If dataset has `month`, selects that month (1-12).                               | `None`     |
| title          | str or None        | Figure title. If None, uses `long_name` or variable name.                        | `None`     |
| colorbar_label | str or None        | Colorbar label. If None, uses `da.units` if available.                           | `None`     |
| output_path    | str or None        | If provided, saves the figure to disk; otherwise shows the figure.               | `None`     |

### map_1var_winds { #scahpy.plots.maps.map_1var_winds }

```python
plots.maps.map_1var_winds(
    da,
    U,
    V,
    *,
    levels,
    cmap='rain',
    shapefile=None,
    extent=None,
    xticks=None,
    yticks=None,
    tick_step=(5, 5),
    draw_grid=False,
    time=None,
    month=None,
    quiver_subsample=7,
    quiverkey_speed=5.0,
    title=None,
    colorbar_label=None,
    output_path=None,
)
```

Draw a filled map of a scalar variable and overlay wind vectors (U, V).

The same temporal selection (`time` or `month`) is applied uniformly to `da`, `U`, and `V`.

#### Parameters {.doc-section .doc-section-parameters}

| Name             | Type              | Description                                                   | Default    |
|------------------|-------------------|---------------------------------------------------------------|------------|
| da               | xarray.DataArray  | Scalar field with `(lat, lon)` and optionally `time`/`month`. | _required_ |
| U                | xarray.DataArray  | Vector components with the same horizontal grid as `da`.      | _required_ |
| V                | xarray.DataArray  | Vector components with the same horizontal grid as `da`.      | _required_ |
| levels           | iterable of float | Discrete color levels for the filled contours.                | _required_ |
| cmap             | str               | Name of the cmocean colormap (lightened internally).          | `'rain'`   |
| shapefile        | str or None       | Custom shapefile path; None uses default SA shapefile.        | `None`     |
| extent           | tuple or None     | Map extent `(lon_min, lon_max, lat_min, lat_max)`.            | `None`     |
| time             | see `map_1var`    | Temporal selector (applied to all inputs).                    | `None`     |
| month            | see `map_1var`    | Temporal selector (applied to all inputs).                    | `None`     |
| quiver_subsample | int               | Arrow subsampling step to reduce density.                     | `7`        |
| quiverkey_speed  | float             | Reference speed (m/s) shown in the quiver key.                | `5.0`      |
| title            | see `map_1var`.   |                                                               | `None`     |
| colorbar_label   | see `map_1var`.   |                                                               | `None`     |
| output_path      | see `map_1var`.   |                                                               | `None`     |

### map_2var_contours { #scahpy.plots.maps.map_2var_contours }

```python
plots.maps.map_2var_contours(
    da_fill,
    da_contour,
    *,
    levels_fill,
    levels_contour,
    cmap_fill='rain',
    colors_contour=('k',),
    linewidths_contour=(1.4,),
    alpha_contour=0.9,
    shapefile=None,
    extent=None,
    xticks=None,
    yticks=None,
    tick_step=(5, 5),
    draw_grid=False,
    time=None,
    month=None,
    label_levels=True,
    title=None,
    colorbar_label=None,
    output_path=None,
)
```

Draw a filled map of a scalar variable and overlay contours
(either of the same variable or another one).

The same temporal selection (`time` or `month`) is applied to both layers.

#### Parameters {.doc-section .doc-section-parameters}

| Name               | Type              | Description                                                        | Default    |
|--------------------|-------------------|--------------------------------------------------------------------|------------|
| da_fill            | xarray.DataArray  | Scalar field for filled contours (background).                     | _required_ |
| da_contour         | xarray.DataArray  | Field for line contours.                                           | _required_ |
| levels_fill        | iterable of float | Levels for filled contours.                                        | _required_ |
| levels_contour     | iterable of float | Levels for the contour lines.                                      | _required_ |
| cmap_fill          | str               | cmocean colormap name for the filled layer (lightened internally). | `'rain'`   |
| colors_contour     | tuple             | Colors for contour lines.                                          | `('k',)`   |
| linewidths_contour | tuple             | Line widths for contour lines.                                     | `(1.4,)`   |
| alpha_contour      | float             | Alpha for contour lines.                                           | `0.9`      |
| shapefile          | Optional\[str\]   | See `map_1var`.                                                    | `None`     |
| extent             | Optional\[str\]   | See `map_1var`.                                                    | `None`     |
| time               | Optional\[str\]   | See `map_1var`.                                                    | `None`     |
| month              | Optional\[str\]   | See `map_1var`.                                                    | `None`     |
| title              | Optional\[str\]   | See `map_1var`.                                                    | `None`     |
| colorbar_label     | Optional\[str\]   | See `map_1var`.                                                    | `None`     |
| output_path        | Optional\[str\]   | See `map_1var`.                                                    | `None`     |

#### Returns {.doc-section .doc-section-returns}

| Name   | Type   | Description   |
|--------|--------|---------------|
|        | None   |               |

### map_2vars_winds { #scahpy.plots.maps.map_2vars_winds }

```python
plots.maps.map_2vars_winds(
    da_fill,
    da_contour,
    U,
    V,
    *,
    levels_fill,
    levels_contour,
    cmap_fill='rain',
    colors_contour=('#F29727', '#C70039', '#511F73'),
    linewidths_contour=(1.5, 1.6, 1.8),
    alpha_contour=0.45,
    quiver_subsample=7,
    quiverkey_speed=5.0,
    shapefile=None,
    extent=None,
    xticks=None,
    yticks=None,
    tick_step=(5, 5),
    draw_grid=False,
    time=None,
    month=None,
    title=None,
    colorbar_label=None,
    output_path=None,
)
```

Draw a filled map (1 variable) + contour overlays (another variable)
+ wind vectors (U, V) — ideal for ocean–atmosphere mixed maps.

The same temporal selection (`time` or `month`) is applied uniformly to all layers.

#### Parameters {.doc-section .doc-section-parameters}

| Name               | Type              | Description                                                        | Default                             |
|--------------------|-------------------|--------------------------------------------------------------------|-------------------------------------|
| da_fill            | xarray.DataArray  | Scalar field for the filled layer (background).                    | _required_                          |
| da_contour         | xarray.DataArray  | Field for contour lines.                                           | _required_                          |
| U                  | xarray.DataArray  | Vector components (same horizontal grid).                          | _required_                          |
| V                  | xarray.DataArray  | Vector components (same horizontal grid).                          | _required_                          |
| levels_fill        | iterable of float | Levels for background and contour lines respectively.              | _required_                          |
| levels_contour     | iterable of float | Levels for background and contour lines respectively.              | _required_                          |
| cmap_fill          | str               | cmocean colormap name for the filled layer (lightened internally). | `'rain'`                            |
| colors_contour     |                   | Style parameters for contour lines.                                | `('#F29727', '#C70039', '#511F73')` |
| linewidths_contour |                   | Style parameters for contour lines.                                | `('#F29727', '#C70039', '#511F73')` |
| alpha_contour      |                   | Style parameters for contour lines.                                | `('#F29727', '#C70039', '#511F73')` |
| quiver_subsample   | int               | Arrow subsampling step.                                            | `7`                                 |
| quiverkey_speed    | float             | Reference speed (m/s) shown in the quiver key.                     | `5.0`                               |
| shapefile          | Optional\[str\]   | See `map_1var`.                                                    | `None`                              |
| extent             | Optional\[str\]   | See `map_1var`.                                                    | `None`                              |
| time               | Optional\[str\]   | See `map_1var`.                                                    | `None`                              |
| month              | Optional\[str\]   | See `map_1var`.                                                    | `None`                              |
| title              | Optional\[str\]   | See `map_1var`.                                                    | `None`                              |
| colorbar_label     | Optional\[str\]   | See `map_1var`.                                                    | `None`                              |
| output_path        | Optional\[str\]   | See `map_1var`.                                                    | `None`                              |

#### Returns {.doc-section .doc-section-returns}

| Name   | Type   | Description   |
|--------|--------|---------------|
|        | None   |               |
